data.name: Breath of Fire III Sound Collection
data.detailed_description:
The original, nostalgic melodies of Capcom's 1998 32-bit RPG classic Breath of Fire III engulf Steam! Breath of Fire III Sound Collection contains 95 poppy and jazzy tunes from Akari Kaida and Yoshino Aoki, including the ending vocal theme, "Pure Again - Staff Roll". As Rei would say, "Doesn't this beat all!"

The 182+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1.1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
